## Books in Quarto

You can also write books with quarto. From the same collection of `.qmd` files, Quarto can generate:

- ePub
- PDF
- Online book

Two recent examples are:

- [Hands-on Programming in R](https://jjallaire.github.io/hopr/), by Garrett Grolemund [source](https://github.com/jjallaire/hopr/)
- [Python for Data Analysis, 3E](https://wesmckinney.com/book/), by Wes McKinney [source](https://github.com/wesm/pydata-book/tree/3rd-edition)
